General.Name: Can Don Hydro Power JSC
General.Description: Can Don Hydro Power Joint Stock Company produces and trades in electricity in Vietnam. It generates electricity through hydropower projects. The company also constructs civil, industrial, transportation, irrigation, post office, urban infrastructure, industrial parks, and water supply and drainage projects; and transmission lines and transformer stations. In addition, it invests in small and medium power projects; manufactures and trades in construction materials, machinery, and equipment; transports materials and equipment; and provides hotel and tourist services. Further, the company is involved in aquaculture and afforestation activities. Can Don Hydro Power Joint Stock Company was founded in 1998 and is based in Bù Ð"p, Vietnam.
